text: Kirby always has epic final boss themes. I actually never got to play this game and... I have to admit that my backlog is so big that after I stored the Wii U back in its box when I bought the Switch, I pretty much told myself I wouldn't play any Wii U exclusives unless they get a re-release someday. There aren't too many quality Wii U exclusives I missed, thankfully.
author: SupraDarky

text: Xenoblade X has some fantastic music for a Wii U game, especially fiKAIeldJOU (Ocean Night) and N木ig木ht木L (Noctilum Day)
author: Wispe

text: Rainbow Curse was a neat little game, though because you spend the entire game looking at the gamepad I don't think this one can be ported properly.
author: Cakeman777

text: Well on the bright side as an Adult it's generally good to have enough things going on that you are forced to keep a backlog of things you could be doing for fun. So many new and old "If I could just free up enough time to justify spending this many hours playing this game." Cheers to you SupraDarky for uploading another good one eh!
author: Honorable I1

text: I would have never guessed it's from a Kirby game. It sounds almost like some tracks from Motoi Sakuraba.
author: MrR2g2

text: Final boss of the prequel on the DS is also amazing.
author: NetConsole

text: This soundtrack plus its many remixes is one of the best Kirby OST's ever.
author: Philip J. Fry II

text: This game was amazing. Hands down one of the most underrated Wii U games.
author: Laihoard

text: This was a beautiful game and enjoyable once you got in to the rhythm of it. Still an odd decision that you basically have to play it purely on the gamepad screen and ignore the tv but still good. I personally felt that the original game on ds worked better though
author: VegaPhil

text: AHHHH I HAVE THIS GAME AND I ONLY PLAYED ONE WORLD I FORGOT ABOUT ITTT

text: This is probably my favorite final boss theme in a kirby game. And it comes from a spin off.
author: Broken Battery Productions

text: I just want to say I stumbled on your Relaxin' playlist this morning and it hit me how damn long you have been at this, and still everything you post is awesome. You are the best user on YouTube and your channel is a national treasure. Thank you.

text: Buddy SD could have started moppin floors at Wal Mart and been President of the Company by now with the "Stick'to'er" he has.
